availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, merchant. Married to Rebecca Markley in Hamilton County, Ohio, in May 1855. Father of Luella Plummer, Laban B. Plummer, William Ira Plummer, Norma Plummer, and Cecil Plummer. Resident of Bracken County in 1860. Merchant in Bracken County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, District No. 1, p. 99.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Foster Precinct, p. 347A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Bracken County, KY, June and July 1863, p. 187.
Ohio Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Hamilton County Marriages, Film #000344469, p. 62.
